item.title: carolyn rhea add a quote by Eric Schmidt
item.description: "The Internet is the first thing that humanity has built that humanity doesn't understand, the largest experiment in anarchy that we have ever had." -- Eric Schmidt

item.title: carolyn rhea add a quote by Ken Kesey
item.description: "Man, when you lose your laugh you lose your footing." -- Ken Kesey

item.title: carolyn rhea add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
carolyn rhea add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "He really had been through death, but he had returned because he could not bear the solitude." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: carolyn rhea add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "Thus they went on living in a reality that was slipping away, momentarily captured by words, but which would escape irremediably when they forgot the values of the written letters." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: carolyn rhea add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "Things have a life of their own," the gypsy proclaimed with a harsh accent. "It's simply a matter of waking up their souls." -- Gabriel García Márquez
